type.name: org.gradle.api.execution.TaskExecutionListener
type.description:
A TaskExecutionListener is notified of the execution of the tasks in a build.

You can add a TaskExecutionListener to a build using org.gradle.api.execution.TaskExecutionGraph#addTaskExecutionListener

method.name: afterExecute
method.description:
This method is call immediately after a task has been executed. It is always called, regardless of whether the task completed successfully, or failed with an exception.
param:task The task which was executed. Never null.
param:state The task state. If the task failed with an exception, the exception is available in this state. Never null.

method.name: beforeExecute
method.description:
This method is called immediately before a task is executed.
param:task The task about to be executed. Never null.
